thlGraphs 1.1
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • thlGraphs: making THL style bar and line plots
    • thlGraphs Vignette Colors
    • thlGraphs: other type of graphs
    • thlGraphs Vignette
  • Changelog

THL visual theme using ggplot2

theme_thl.Rd

Complete theme controlling all non-data display.

theme_thl(
  base_size = 16,
  base_family = "ArialMT",
  base_line_size = thlPtsConvert(1.5),
  base_rect_size = thlPtsConvert(1.5),
  horizontal = FALSE,
  show_axis_line = TRUE,
  ...
)

Arguments

base_size

base font size in PostScript points
base_family

base font family
base_line_size

base size for line elements
base_rect_size

base size for rect elements
horizontal

Set as TRUE if plotting horizontal bars.
show_axis_line

Should axis line be drawn? Axis line should be removed if the coordinate axes are not in the border of the plot
...

additional properties defined in theme()

Value

theme() object, to be combined with ggplot object with "+"

Examples

# add this to the usual plot with "+"
theme_thl()
#> List of 62
#>  $ line                 :List of 6
#>   ..$ colour       : chr "#dcdfe2"
#>   ..$ size         : num 0.529

theme_thl(horizontal = TRUE)
